refnamediv.refpurpose: How to extend Nautilus-Actions and develop new plugins ?

refsect1.title: Plugin Overview
refsect1.para: &prodname; may be extended by developing new extensions which will be dynamically taken into account at runtime. These are plugins.
As of today, &prodname; may be extended in the following areas:

formalpara.title: Storing menus and actions in a specific storage subsystem
formalpara.para: This extension is provided via the public NAIIOProvider interface; it takes care of reading and writing menus and actions to a specific storage subsystem.

formalpara.title: Exporting menus and actions
formalpara.para: This extension is provided via the public NAIExporter interface; it takes care of exporting menus and actions to the filesystem from the &prodname; Configuration Tool user interface.

formalpara.title: Importing menus and actions
formalpara.para: This extension is provided via the public NAIImporter interface; it takes care of importing menus and actions from the filesystem into the &prodname; Configuration Tool user interface.
